commit.message:
Merge #156

156: Cargo Update run r=kjeremy a=kjeremy

Bump relative-path to 0.4.0
Failure 0.1.3 to fix leak with downcast

Updated everything else too

Co-authored-by: Jeremy A. Kolb <jkolb@ara.com>
